processing.label: Processing
processing.tooltip: Reward is being processed by our team, usually within 2 weeks

pendingRequest.label: Pending request
pendingRequest.tooltip: Please request a payment to process your rewards.

signupPending.label: Signup invoice
signupPending.tooltip: You need to sign up on OnlyDust to get paid

payoutInfoMissing.label: Payment method missing
payoutInfoMissing.tooltip: Fill in your payment method to get paid

pendingSignup.label: Pending signup
pendingSignup.tooltip: Contributor needs to sign up on OnlyDust and to complete payout info to get paid

pendingVerification.label: Pending verification
pendingVerification.tooltip: You need to verify your information to get paid

pendingContributor.label: Pending contributor
pendingContributor.tooltip: Contributor needs to do an action to get paid

pendingCompany.label: Pending company
pendingCompany.tooltip: Company needs to do an action to get paid

pendingBillingProfile.label: Pending billing profile
pendingBillingProfile.tooltip: You need to select a billing profile for this reward

GEO_BLOCKED.label: Payment blocked
GEO_BLOCKED.tooltip: This currency not allowed in your territory. Please change your billing profile or contact support.

INDIVIDUAL_LIMIT_REACHED.label: Payment blocked
INDIVIDUAL_LIMIT_REACHED.tooltip: You've exceeded the $5000 limit for an individual. Please create a company or legal entity and add it as a new billing profile.
